title:
The Equation of Excluded Volume Effects: A Minor Improvement in the
  Evaluation of the Inhomogeneity Term
authors: Kazumi Suematsu, Haruo Ogura, Seiichi Inayama, and Toshihiko Okamoto
abstract:
A minor improvement is made to the calculation of the inhomogeneity term. The
new calculation gives better agreement with the observations of Daoud et al.
and Cheng-Graessley-Melnichenko.
